title: WWE 2K Android
description:
Most awaited WWE game is finally arrived on Android and IOS with licensed characters and their signature attacks.Play offline or play online with other players online. Select your preferred costumes for your wrestler and jump right in to the arena. Developed using Unity engine game delivers great physics and graphics in the game. using your favorite character in the ring its a delightful experience for all the wwe lovers. there are no in app purchases in the game, no coin or gems system. looks like developers of this game knows how to make a better taste game. If you are a true WWE fan then this game is for you. download it now. WWE 2k by 2k Games APK and Data files.

WWE 2K, the only authentic WWE in-ring mobile game, puts the power, intensity, and raw emotion of WWE wrestling in the palm of your hand.
